meanings.definition: The state of having, owning, or controlling something.
meanings.sent1: Her possession of the toy made her very happy.
meanings.sent2: The possession of the house was transferred to the new owner.
meanings.sent3: His possession of the remote control led to a playful chase around the living room.
meanings.sent4: The possession of knowledge is a powerful tool in today's world.
meanings.sent5: The possession of the treasure map filled them with excitement and anticipation.

meanings.definition: Something that is owned or possessed.
meanings.sent1: The shiny car was his most prized possession.
meanings.sent2: She treasured her possession of the old family heirloom.
meanings.sent3: The possession of the magical ring granted him unexpected powers.
meanings.sent4: His possession of the rare painting made him the envy of art collectors.
meanings.sent5: The possession of the key unlocked a door to a hidden world.

meanings.definition: The act of taking control or ownership of something.
meanings.sent1: The possession of the crown marked the beginning of his reign.
meanings.sent2: The possession of the stolen goods led to his arrest.
meanings.sent3: Her possession of the last cookie caused a playful tug-of-war.
meanings.sent4: The possession of power can sometimes corrupt even the noblest of hearts.
meanings.sent5: The possession of the microphone gave her the stage to share her voice.
